Name: BAD END
About the game: Kyuuhei Inui has never been one to take rumors as anything but that - rumors, until his best friend had died while playing the game... Kyuuhei is driven to find out the truth behind his friend's mysterious death by any means possible. After exhausting all ideas, he decided the only way to find out the truth is to play 'BAD END' himself. Will Kyuuhei risk his life to get to the bottom of the game's mystery or will he meet his demise? Drastic short story that will branch according to your 'choice'. Surprising ending included! Do not forget 'CG MODE' and 'MUSIC MODE' after playing. Comfortable playing environment by game engine 'ADV+++', specialized in VN games.
